Events that occurred on 7 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 163.
1957 - Marquette University acquires many of Tolkien's manuscripts for £1,500 (worth ££50,714 in 2025).
1964 - Actor Brian Talbot is born.
1972 – Actor Karl Urban is born.
1981 - The fourteenth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1999 - Tolkien: A Celebration: Collected Writings on a Literary Legacy is published.
2008 - Forodrim's 36th birthday celebration.
2015 - Actor Christopher Lee dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
